ORG_0000038 - homepage disposition
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Label

    homepage disposition

.. topic:: Definition

    A dispsition to be the primary website for an entity.

.. topic:: Definition source

    Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447

.. topic:: Editor's note

    Skeptical about this.  Is it a quality? A type of web page?

.. topic:: Term editor

    Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
